amendment.description: Amendment requires the EPA and Army Corps of Engineers to issue the final federal permit for the Lower Bois d'Arc Creek Reservoir Project no later than September 30, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-794 to require the EPA and Army Corps of Engineers to issue the final federal permit for the Lower Bois d'Arc Creek Reservoir Project no later than September 30, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Johnson, Sam.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson, Sam amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
